title: New: Watercolours â€“ Sliders
content:
With Lorde leading the way for New Zealand pop, now is certainly the time for Kiwi artists to make their mark around the rest of the world.

One who is sure to be right up at the top is Chelsea Metcalf aka Watercolours, who impresses on new track Sliders, that has the fragile elegance of Lorde, yet is built upon the dreamy, electronic foundations that you might expect from Purity Ring or GEMS. Check out Sliders below, and keep up with Watercolours over at Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
